pr_title: Clean up cacheSpec and backoffSpec documentation

timeline.message:
Clean up cacheSpec and backoffSpec documentation

Motivation:

The descriptions of `*cacheSpec` and `defaultBackoffSpec` flags do not
explain what they do exactly in their first sentence.

Modifications:

- Update the Javadoc of the methods that returns or accepts a Caffeine
  specification string or backoff specification string so that it's more
  user-friendly.

Result:

- Hopefully easier to understand that these flags do actually.

timeline.bodyText: Don't we need to specify message for requireNonNull such as requireNonNull(..., name)?
timeline.author: ikhoon

replies.bodyText: It never returns null when allowOff is false. requireNonNull here is just to make the static analysis happy.
replies.author: trustin
